logout.title: Log Out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.detail: All conversations will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

deleteSession.title: Delete Conversation
deleteSession.message: Are you sure you want to delete: "{{name}}"?

resetDefaults.title: Reset to Defaults
resetDefaults.detail:
To reset Craft Agent to defaults, quit the app and run:

bun run fresh-start

This will delete all configuration, credentials, workspaces, and sessions.
